titleStmt.title: The picture of patience. Or, a direction to perfection Most needfull and vsefull in these dangerous daies of sinne, and publike feares.
titleStmt.author: Jeffray, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. H[arper] for Robert Milbourne, and are to be sould at his shop, in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Gray-Hound,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Gray-Hound
